segments.text: How were things in the Tokyo branch when you were there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good ! They have expanded and are doing better than they were last quarter . It's nice to see some improvement for a change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you see the trend continuing over the next few months ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , especially with so many of our executives going back and forth from here to Japan . The only problem is , they may have trouble when they go to open up business here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They aren't too familiar with doing business outside of Japan . There are a lot of cultural differences to account for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll say ! Sometimes they just do things really differently . But one thing I can say , they are really hospitable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever been to Japan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure ! I just got back yesterday . I'm still suffering from jet lag .
segments.speaker: S1
